flavorText: Having no interest in the greater conflict, the trolls continue to prey upon whatever wanders into their domain.

foreignData.flavorText: Nicht daran interessiert, in den tobenden Krieg hineingezogen zu werden, begnügen sich die Trolle weiter damit, jenen aufzulauern, die in ihr Revier eindringen.
foreignData.name: Erntetroll
foreignData.text: Wenn der Erntetroll ins Spiel kommt, kannst du eine Kreatur oder ein Land opfern. Falls du dies tust, lege zwei +1/+1-Marken auf den Erntetroll.

foreignData.flavorText: El trol no tienen ningún interés en el conflicto bélico. Se limita a acechar y engullir todo lo que se adentre en sus dominios.
foreignData.name: Trol cosechador
foreignData.text: Cuando el Trol cosechador entre al campo de batalla, puedes sacrificar una criatura o tierra. Si lo haces, pon dos contadores +1/+1 sobre el Trol cosechador.

foreignData.flavorText: トロールは戦争の全貌などに興味はない。おのれの縄張りに入る者にひたすら襲いかかるのみである。

foreignData.flavorText: 더 큰 전투에는 관심이 없었던 트롤들은 자신의 영역에서 배회하는 먹잇감만을 계속 사냥했다.

name: Harvester Troll
originalText: When Harvester Troll enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice a creature or land. If you do, put two +1/+1 counters on Harvester Troll.

rulings.text: Players can respond to the enters-the-battlefield ability (notably, while Harvester Troll is still 2/3), but once that ability starts resolving, it’s too late for any player to respond. You don’t choose which creature or land you’re sacrificing, if any, until the ability resolves.

text: When Harvester Troll enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice a creature or land. If you do, put two +1/+1 counters on Harvester Troll.
